lead_paragraph: Serena Williams will be the best-known player for the newest team in World TeamTennis, the Washington Kastles. Williams, who has won eight Grand Slam singles titles, will play in only four of the Kastles’ 14 regular-season matches and only once in Washington, against the Boston Lobsters on July 8. The Kastles will play their home matches in a 2,020-seat temporary stadium set up in a parking lot where the city’s convention center used to stand.
